Name: GNRBLEX
About the game: Can you preserve the Gnrblexian Mind Maggot from extinction? Take on the challenge and preserve both the species, and humanity's fragile sense of self-worth, in this retro-inspired point and click adventure game. Features: - Traditional point'n'click gameplay - Retro-inspired visuals and art - New, original soundtrack by / - Full voice acting by four talented voice actors - A dark sense of humour - Math! - Extra wriggling (Game originally released in 2016 as part of the 'Monthly AGS' -competition on the Adventure Game Studios -forums. This old version lacked the full soundtrack, voice acting, and some puzzles, and used older, cruder graphics.)
